name: There is Nothing there
description:
When the kids screem in the fear of darknes. The parents only open the Wardrobe doors and say "There is nothing there". But kids see the truth, There are monsters in Wardrobe and only Plush Ninja Bunnies can save the Day.

Gamepad Controls:
Movement - Left analog
Jump - X button
Attack - Y button

Keyboard Controls:

P1
Movement - A,D
Jump - H
Attack - J

P2
Movement - Left, Right arrow
Jump - Num 2
Attack - Num 3
